item.description:
RSVP to obtain participation info :http://simplydoit.net/RSVPtoWebinar

---------------------------------------------------------

 

A MUST for every real estate investor. Attorney Bruce E. Methven will share with us the following information:

  • Understanding the risks investors are faced with
  • Asset protection methods - a review
  • Simple and advanced asset protections tools
  • Are LLCs the right asset entity for you?
  • Single-member LLCs and series LLCs
  • Q&A


About our Speaker
Bruce E. Methven is the principal of Methven & Associates (www.methvenlaw.com), a business‑law firm based in Berkeley. He graduated from Boalt Hall School of Law
(U.C. Berkeley) in 1980.

His law firm forms business entities; structures real‑estate deals; handles securities-law work for offerings to investors; reviews contracts, leases and licenses; files trademark applications; advises on real-estate, business and employment law; handles probates, particularly those involving real estate; and represents clients in commercial litigation and arbitration.

-------------------------------------------------------------------

RSVP to obtain participation info :http://simplydoit.net/RSVPtoWebinar
item.name: Webinar: Asset Protection & Proper Use of Entities for Investors
